Title: Revelations
Plot: Mulder and Scully swap roles as they pursue a man killing priests that claim to have the wounds of Christ. The agents find and must protect a young boy who may be a real stigmatic. While Scully's faith draws her close to the boy, Mulder is convinced of another explanation.
GuestStars: Kevin Zegers, Sam Bottoms, Kenneth Welsh, Michael Berryman, Hayley Tyson, Leslie Swan, Fulvio Cecere, Nicole Robert, Selina Williams, R. Lee Ermey, Rhys Huber
